QuestData.Title: An Axe to Grind
QuestData.Description: I, Gamon, have cleaved many orc skulls. Yet many of the iron horde remain, full of limbs and blood. I will relieve them of these things!$B$BOr I would, if I had an axe. The last one broke in half in the middle of an orc's ribcage.$B$B<Gamon laughs heartily.>$B$BBring me another, so that I may continue cleaving my way through this land!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find an Iron Limbcleaver in Grimrail Depot.
